name: DC Task Force
summary: DC Task Force is a game where you explore the DC universe, visiting classic cities and planets, assembling your own Justice League team and recruiting members to protect planet Earth from an alien invasion. This campaign can be completed in just over an hour, but would require at least 7 hours to explore the entire universe and recruit all possible characters.
